[ C ] a word or expression that was first used in the US but is now used by people in other countries, especially those where English is spoken: "O.K." is an Americanism now used all over the world.
[ U ] culture, beliefs, and behaviour that are typical of the US: He was an immigrant who made it in America; Americanism was his religion.
